en.welcome1-page-header: Please complete your profile name and your email adress
en.welcome2-page-header: Please add your activation code. You can add this later, after the registration process
en.welcome2-page-subheader: Use the activation code in your Guido Guide to get access to all the vouchers.

en.welcome3-page-header: Tell us what you like, and we’ll select the bestvouchers for you.

en.voucher-use-page-text1: Show this screen at the counter.
en.voucher-use-page-text2: Claim your voucher, confirm by pushing the button.
en.voucher-use-success: The voucher was successfuly used for you to have fun.
en.voucher-enter-code: Enter a city guide activation app to start using the vouchers!

en.activation-box-buy-guido-guide: Buy a Guido Guide with free activation code
en.error-unknown: Unknown error. Please try again later.
en.error-enter-activation-code: Enter your activation code to use this voucher
en.isic-card-flip-card: Show the back of the card
